sentence.Network_en: He saw himself standing up and repelling a charge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他仿佛看见自己挺身而起,打退了敌人的进攻.

sentence.Network_en: Promote the healthy entertainment styles . Repelling the superstition , gambling, drugs and obscenity.
sentence.Network_cn: 提倡健康娱乐. 抵制封建迷信活动,拒绝黄 、 赌 、 毒.

sentence.Network_en: Far from repelling his advances she rather encouraged him.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不但不拒绝他的求爱,反而半推半就.

entry.def: When an army repels an attack, they successfully fight and drive back soldiers from another army who have attacked them.

example.ex: They have fifty thousand troops along the border ready to repel any attack.
example.tran: 他们有5万人的部队驻扎在边境，随时准备击退任何进攻。

entry.def: When a magnetic pole repels another magnetic pole, it gives out a force that pushes the other pole away. You can also say that two magnetic poles repel each other or that they repel .

example.ex: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract...
As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
example.tran: 因为这些电子都是带负电荷的，它们会互相排斥。

entry.def: If something repels you, you find it horrible and disgusting.

example.ex: ...a violent excitement that frightened and repelled her.
example.tran: 使她恐惧和厌恶的强烈兴奋感

means.word_mean: 1. highly offensive; arousing aversion or disgust;

sentences.sentence: "the idea of eating meat is repellent to me"

auth_sentence.content: To prepare a pure attractive or repelling state, one should detune the cavity slightly from the atomic transition.
